title: Add split.key support in SolrJ (SplitShard Collections API)
description: There's no way to specify a split key when using SolrJ to split a shard in Solr. We should add that.

comments.author: Anshum Gupta
comments.content:
Moved and refactored SolrJ tests from CollectionsAPIDistributedZkTest.

Added support for split.key in SolrJ and also a corresponding test.
